website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and affordable unit with a twin tub design for simultaneous washing and spinning of loads.
pros: Twin tubs let you wash and spin loads at the same time
Washer can hold up to 8 pounds, while the spinner can hold 5 pounds
Has both washer and spinner timers
cons: Both the drainage and intake hoses are pretty short

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe this machine could do so much. I love it. The only thing is the drain hose is very short for the kitchen sink so I have to use it in the bathroom. The directions said don't use in tub but you have to for the drain hose and the water inlet is not compatible with the kitchen faucet so you have to improvise on your own.i use my shower head to fill up, the drain hose lays flat in my tub and I use an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Little bit bigger than I thought but it’s AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this washer!! We have a pipe busted in our apartment so we can’t have a normal washer. So we put this one in our bathroom and have the gravity drain tube in the tub!! Works amazing! And the spin dryer actually gets stuff really dry! I’m in love
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes D.

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got a defective unit. I informed the seller. The seller sent a free replacement unit. Things are working great now. Super customer service.
customer_reviews.author: PKWOrlando

customer_reviews.title: Where do I start?
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I usually don't leave reviews but I'm extremely frustrated. I received the machine yesterday and immediately began washing clothes. Everything was perfect. Today I get home from work filled up the machine, added soap and the clothes. Guess what???????? I try turning the dial to 15 minutes and all I hear is rattling. What a complete disappointment... So mad!
customer_reviews.author: Julissa Mejia

customer_reviews.title: did not last a year no warranty past 6 months
customer_reviews.text: this unit is not the best at washing but it will clean clothes . but it is labor intensive since you have to fill the water up drain it and rinse the clothes manually. my main issue is the month warranty and the fact it broke right after the warranty. i am buying a fully automatic unit now since this will reduce the manual labor. update according to the seller it was a 1 year warranty but they want me to ship it back which is as much as a new one. i bought a much better fully automatic machine and threw away this one. i dont recomend this machine since it is too labor intensive and broke so soon.
customer_reviews.author: turbo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a week of small loads
customer_reviews.text: it quit! I did small Loads to make sure to not overload it 😭 I threw away the box so I can’t send it back. I reached out to the company and they sent suggestions on how to fix it which I appreciated bit none of them have worked. I’m Very bummed. I am on a very fixed income and can’t afford to buy another one so now I’m out no a hundred bucks
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: If your looking this is the one trust me!
customer_reviews.text: Super amazing! This washer was purchased for our sailboat. I couldn’t wait to use it. It was delivered today and I have already washed a few loads. The agitation is unbelievable and it spins the clothes virtually dry! What a great purchase. Oh and it arrived a week early!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Spires

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED AND LEAKED WATER
customer_reviews.text: It is very loud and does not extract the water properly also it is not as described my old machine was for 11lbs and this one seems like 5 0r 7..the hose is extremely short ... the extra hose that came with this machine does not fit the faucet..... water was leaking everywhere the hose had a hole Well..maybe someone will have better luck than I did ...
customer_reviews.author: Penn79

customer_reviews.title: Spin dryer does it's job, however don't expect them to be completely dry. Consider getting an extension cord and extenstion inle
customer_reviews.text: This machine honestly blew me away. I got mine today and was skeptical and my first 2 washes went great. It cleans my clothes effectively and efficiently. The only downfall this machine faces is the water inlet is far too short. For the money this is a steal. The spin dryer effectively dries the clothes, clothes will be damp but it will take little to no time to dry. Pants and heavy articles of clothing will take some time to dry after the spin cycle but all around if you need a washing machine in a tight space. This is your answer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just received mine today (May 1st 2018) and I love it already! The spin dry almost completely dries the clothes!! Also the spin dry is a little on the loud side but it gets the job done! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today very quick delivery...I love it ..very impressed for 100.00...haven't done towels yet so can't say for sure how that will go..have no doubt the washer will do a great job ...will see how the spinning goes...washer is much much larger than I expected. The spinner does a terrific job getting casual clothes almost dry ..will wait and see how it does with towels...the only issue I saw is that the hoses are too short....I used buckets to fill and washed close to my shower so I could drain it.. plan to buy a detachable shower head to fill and that will work well. Love how compact it is makes for easy storing just about anywhere..
customer_reviews.author: EJ shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I was skeptical about buying a portable washer but this is one of the best decisions I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Malaura Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I'm losing my mind over how much I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the water inlet hose, (which I found to be absolutely useless and decided to use my shower hose to fill it instead), this machine is awesome! I was worried it wouldn't clean my fabrics well, but it does! I was worried it would only fit the items, but it actually fits 3 bath towels easily! I was worried the son cycle wouldn't actually get the water out if my items, but they come out 80-85% dry! I'm so insanely satisfied I almost can't put it into words! Great deal for a great machine!
customer_reviews.author: NurseNYC

customer_reviews.title: A must have for small families
customer_reviews.text: This machine deserves 5 stars all the way. My doesn’t have to waste half a day to lug all the laundry to the laundromat anymore. We use it twice a week for family of 3. Does not use that much electricity either. We find the bath tub to be the best place to use it . Just use the shower head to fill it and also you don’t have to worry about figuring out the drain part.
customer_reviews.author: Irfan C.

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I received a unit about a week ago, so excited to use I took out, hooked up ... guess what doesn’t work. Contacted company and they were EXTREMELY DIFFICULT so after I complained they decided to send another unit in which I received today. Yet I received ANOTHER broken machine, it makes the noise of the timer and just does nothing. I went through the reviews and I still decided to try the machine and been extremely unsatisfied. I would suggest you look at other machines before this one. I can’t wait to see the chase I have to go through this time to get my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: So pissed😡
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and it won't turn on!!!! I want to return it but I have to take it to UPS. I should not have to drag this thing on the train to return it!!! So not only did I pay for a defective product but I also have to go out of my way to return it to get MY $ back!!!! All I wanna do is throw the damn thing in the trash🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Leaking out of the box and maybe used?
customer_reviews.text: The washer works great, really agitates the clothes well. The spinner started leaking and made an impressive mess on my bathroom floor. I fiddled around with the settings and finally realized that the washer from the spinner to the body has a leak. When I opened the box it looks like it was used but I though maybe someone did quality testing on it. It's a huge box and so packing it up and sending it back, huge pain. I'll say this, the spinner really gets the clothes dry, so if you can get a unit that doesn't leak, you're golden. I think it's a winner for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Ashori

customer_reviews.title: Great little workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: This compact washer works great for my needs. I am a fabric dyer who needs to be able to wash and spin out my fabric. This little gem is a workhorse. I have the perfect spot for the washer right next to a laundry sink. So the washer is able to sit on the floor and as I had purchased an extra hose hookup I am able to run the hose to the floor drain. I am a happy camper - so sorry I waited so long! I purchased the drain hose extension with the washer and I also bought regular washer hoses for the hot and cold water - so very easy to fill and drain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine back in February as I was tired of running to the laundromat mid winter. The best decision I made. it is compact, and does a great job for the size. I use it all the time for towels, clothes, small blankets. A few weeks ago the spinner stopped spinning. I got in contact with the seller, after attempting to fix the issues with no positive results, they sent me a whole new unit. The units arrived in 2 days from the shipping notification. No hassle and they always replied within a couple hours. Great Machine, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Cadey

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived earlier than expected. When I hooked it up it washed quite a lot of items but the second dry spin part did not work. I loved the size and light weight and would’ve kept it if it fully worked. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: FedEx "lost" this while it was out for delivery. Seller responded to my email immediately and sent a replacement. FedEx misplaced that one also, but after a barrage of annoyed calls from me, found it and delivered it today. It sure is a cute little item and works great. The only noise is for the first few seconds after the spinner starts but that quickly stops once it begins to spin at full blast. It works as advertised and I have already done two loads. It takes a little more effort than a full size machine, but it makes up for that in price, size and mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: low quality, time-consuming, breaks fast
customer_reviews.text: Yet another cheaply made waste of time from Amazon.com. It takes a lot of effort to wash and spin a load of clothes. It doesn't get them clean. I washed these sweatpants four times. It can't filter out any pet hair, accidental tissues or any large particles of dirt from the clothes like a normal spinning washing machine does. The soap never seems to rinse all the way out. The hose sink attachment split in two after a month, making the whole machine completely worthless to me, and unsellable. I am really upset at how much Amazon has wasted my time with total crap like this.
customer_reviews.author: ZorkNation

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Well it just stopped working after a month..I didn't use it all June,maybe used it 4 times but did two different loads each time today I did my first load as usual , finished the second and went to drain it,I don't know what happened but now it won't spin,just make the spin noise but subtle.i tried to see if the washer part would at least wash and same thing,making little noise but not spinning.im so sad and loved my lil machine, delivery was fast and up to now I had no worries 😭😭.welp guess $200 out the drain.. could have used the public laundry and saved more.
customer_reviews.author: natasha buah

customer_reviews.title: I have stopped working after only six months of use, disappointed!Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have stopped working after only six months of use, disappointed!Not recommended, strongly not recommended, poor quality
customer_reviews.author: JIANBOHU

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t happy with item
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great idea but poorly made. The cord is short and you have to do to much for a single wash like refill to rinse all detergent out of clothes. It was just more of a inconvenience than convenience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful and exactly what you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocking surprised at the power of this machine. I received the machine before the expected delivery date which was much appreciated! It was easy to set up and even easier to figure out a routine to use it. I placed the machine in the bathtub on top of a large container lid (to try to prevent from water damage). The washer fits about 5 shirts. 2 pants and a few socks. I have also used it to wash 4-5 towels at a time. Highly recommend using fabric softener as the clothing does come out a bit stiff. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for something small and convenient to allow them to upkeep their laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Adames

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was the BEST investment I've made! I use it for light loads, especially my gym clothes, undergarments, pj's, socks and work blouses and it washers extremely well!!! I put it inside of the tub, use my show head to fill it up with water and drain it in the tub as well. Moved into an apartment building with no washer & dryer, so I would have to go out to the laundromat, rain, snow or shine, which I hated. I suffer from migraines and use non-scented soap, but every time I used their washers, my clothes will alway smell like the previous persons soap. YUCK!!! Highly recommended : )
customer_reviews.author: carmen crespo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: It was excellent at the beginning but after the 4-5 months of use the water leaks from the spinner. The description says it’s ‘Not loud at all’ but it gets super loud. The hoe doesn’t even fit on the faucet properly
customer_reviews.author: Sange

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work out
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sad I wanted this to work out it but it didnt.. first my spinner didnt work... so emailed them they sent me a video which it worked but had to hold it the whole time .. ugh and now my water is having a hard time draining .. cant return it now ...
customer_reviews.author: Leah Corey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My basement was flooded so my washer and dryer need to be replaced but until I am able to do that I bought this and am super glad I did. This is small and therefore requires more loads but sure beats going to the laundromat any day! I have had this for two months now and it has done all the laundry for my family of four except for the comforters off our beds.
customer_reviews.author: aimee750

customer_reviews.title: You will love this Washer
customer_reviews.text: Ok I was so nervous that this was going to let me down. It didn’t. It arrived extremely fast, it’s easy to use and fits perfectly in my closet. It may be small but it does hold a lot of clothes. It does justice with my clothes. I hate laundromats and now this purchase has saved me. It didn’t fully dry your clothes but it gets them damm well near dry. I just washed my first load of laundry and it smells amazing in my home and my clothes are completely clean and some of my stuff came out the spin cycle already dry
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Pherarri

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Good for something that you need quick or need to hide from the landlord. It has a few flaws it’s quiet when it washes but I find the spinner is noisy when it starts. You also have to put a few clothes in the spinner if you fill it to the top it will make pound noise. Where the water empties it’s very short two have a bucket or put it in the bathtub . I don’t recommend using powdered laundry detergent cause it stays on the clothes. It’s not bad though I got a good wear out of it then gave it to someone .
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I've increased the rating to a 3-star from a 1-star after a representative reached out on my behalf to better settle the problem encountered with the machine, and to solve the confusion between a previous representative. It restores my faith in this company for taking the (unfortunate) dispute so seriously. Review: Dryer is extremely loud and obnoxious. Washing machine does not wash very well. Upon being contacted by a Customer Service Rep from SuperDealUSA (after a long dispute with a differing representative), it turned out the machine I had received was damaged. Customer service upon attempting to return the item was some of the worst I had experienced prior to the new Rep reaching out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lucas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY A HEADACHE FOR YOURSELF
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be treated as a nobody and want to have a washing machine that doesn't do the job please buy this product. I bought this for my daughter who lives in a tiny apartment just got a job $12/hour with a college degree and she cannot afford the laundromat. This machine just doesn't wash the clothes. It is absolutely useless. I wanted to return and they said sell it or give it to a friend and they will send me $15 as a gift😂😂. What a scam company.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Szakacs

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS (in manu ways) BETTER THAN A WASHING MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE: 1) the washer REALLY washes and you don't need much detergent. 2) fairly quiet. No louder than a standard washing machine. 3) drains really fast. 4) the dryer DRIES. IT REALLY DRIES. your clothes go from soaking wet to ALMOST DRY in 6 minutes. UNBELIEVABLE. 5) SUPER portable. Fits anywhere. SUGGESTION: 1) the power cord needs to be longer. Get an extension cord or have the unit plugged in higher than the unit. 2) buy plastic dryer balls to help agitate the clothing while in the washer. Agitation works fine, but these little balls really help.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Monroe

customer_reviews.title: It does what it say it will do. Smaller than expected/hoped. Still satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace a larger one I have from. A different manufacturer. I honestly wish I spent the extra $20 and bought the exact replica of my previous one. Dont get me wrong, This is not a bad machine and it does what it says it will do. My only issue is that I am used to a larger capacity bin and the spin cycle on this is not as strong as my previous one. If I hadn't experienced the other one I would be over the moon with tnis one. So if someone is trying for the 1srlt time, this is definitely going to do the job. No lint remover/collector so you can imagine lol
customer_reviews.author: Bethany G.

customer_reviews.title: I used this machine 10 times, it does the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this machine 10 times, it does the job very well, very quiet, and steady. It arrived 3 days after I ordered it. definitely will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: If you can, spend a bit more to get a nicer washer
customer_reviews.text: This is all plastic except for the spinner. The plastic in the washing bin gets grimy really fast. I have to wash the side of the washing bin every 2-3 uses. When you drain the washing water from the bin, the grime floats on top and settles on your clothes. The spinner gets unbalanced very easily and makes a noisy clunking sound. I found out too late that the spinning basket was slamming into the sides of the machine and that the friction burned a hole into the washing portion. I strongly recommend you spend a little more and get a portable washer that had the spinner and the washing section together (ie not two separate compartments).
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it about 5 months ago and it already broke. Spin cycle in a separate compartment isn’t working. Seller is not responding. Hose that comes with a washer is too short and very poor quality. You’ll have to buy a separate hose for it. Wash isn’t good for items that have pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Yana Nesterenko

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We live in NYC and we got our portable washing machine for this crazy quarantine time where all of the laundry places are closed, and this was an awesome investment! We are for sure going to continue to use this when the laundry places reopen. The clothes come out very clean, and the spinner is amazing! It makes the clothes almost 100% dry, we just had to get a rack to leave the heavier clothes that don't dry that fast to stay a couple of hours to finish drying. But it accomplished all of my expectations, it has been great to do our own laundry at home.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Costa

customer_reviews.title: No more laundry mat, Saves money, Saves the planet:)
customer_reviews.text: So no one sis to California but this company, and I took a chance on them just before the Covid19 outbreak. To my surprise was one of the best investments I ever did this year, this bad boy washes, and practically dries my clothes in half the time I would at the laundry mat, I save time and money and of course I stay in quarantine in my home. But overall my clothes are clean, much softer and easily cleaned. Very light, and I actually plan on getting the portable dryer as well, since utilities are included where I live which is a rare find in the bay area.... Everyone stay positive and healthy, hope this review helps:)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: When I use this product for the first time and even now I noticed the hose has a leak somewhere under the bottom. It is not as quiet as I would have expected. And it seem like a used product when I received it, the plastic wrapping was not really there. As if someone used it and decided no longer wanted it. It just looked used. But traveling in and out of the country did not give me time to return it in a timely fashion so kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So inlove with this washer & Spin dryer
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this and I really really love how clean your laundry gets in it. As soon as I got it to my door i came in and set it up and my older 2 Sons love it too. The one thing I didn't like is you had to pay shipping I wish it was prime so I would of just had to pay the price of it and that's it. Other then that it's perfect for me to clean my daughter's cloth diapers and inserts and cloth wipes in gets them all really clean and everything get very close to dry and fully drys in seconds
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I cannot agree with those who are using this instead of their regular washer and dryer. That won't work for me. Having said that if you were in a dorm or a small apartment with no washer then this will work for you. I used this in my camper. It worked for everything I needed it for. The clothes dried with in a few hours just by hanging them up with a fan blowing on them. The clothes come out pretty dry. So for less than a hundred dollars I feel i faired well with this. I will update my post later if I try to wash jeans. Not sure how it will work for them since I wear 38/34's.
customer_reviews.author: Max R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is amazing. Used it for at least 30 loads during our month long camping trip. The spinning is really high powered as stated in other reviews. I had a little technical issue, which was promptly addressed by the seller . . . so great customer service as well. Now it's going to the boat for a two week trip on the ocean. I don't know how I lived without this little gem before. Perfect for campers and boaters. My friend saw it and is buying one for his daughter for her apartment at college. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Pirate's First Mate

customer_reviews.title: Great washer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this washer for over a year now. I use it about once per week. I live in a small apartment, and I can tuck this into a corner without it taking up too much space. I just stick it in the tub when I use it so that I can use my shower hose to fill it up and then the water can drain out into the tub. It doesn’t require a lot of detergent at all, and while it’s tough to figure out the proper weight to put in the spin dryer so that it will work without clunking or tearing up the inside of the compartment, it still has worked just fine for my laundry needs.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: NOT easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come with a instruction how to use except where are the switches are with NO further information that is not helpful at all to use the product. It came with 2 hoses are not attachable or extendable from the hose that is attached to the washer. You need some kind a furniture to put under so that you can drain the water from the washer which was not explained at all either on the product video or instruction, but I figured out after watching the videos from Youtube. Since my bath tub is so narrow & with glass doors, I can't use this product unless I purchase a new furniture & extension hose.
customer_reviews.author: insook ellen kim

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this washer
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a review with a video but this was well worth every penny. My clothes came out of the spinner with dry patches meaning it completely wrings out the water. I purchased this because my washer is getting fixed and hate going to the laundrymat even more now. I barely received the product and used it right away so far Im completely happy with it. Don't hesitate to purchase this washer its so worth it. If you have any questions about it just ask.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: Had this for several months now and I am loving it. Like everyone says I should’ve got it years ago! There’s a lot of good tips and tricks in the comment section on YouTube videos about these kinds of machines so I highly recommend The people go there and read them. But it’s really just a fantastic machine that you will come to love! One little trick I learned is that you can use the stiff styrofoam packing materials it came with as risers and vibration-absorbing cushions in your bathtub. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reeny

customer_reviews.title: Great Washer for my RV, highly recommend for 1-2 persons
customer_reviews.text: I did all of my laundry (single person) with the washer. I set it in my shower of my RV for ease of drainage. It was level. I washed 5 pairs of jeans (not recommended) but you can easily wash 3-4 pairs. The spin only will do 2 nicely in a few minutes so since I can run both at the same time I just ran them twice (2 pairs each time). I did all of my laundry today and very pleased with the results. I travel all summer in my travel trailer and this is the perfect solution to no longer go to a laundry mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely obsessed with this little wonder. I was skeptical at first about the level of cleaning ability but it got out stains from dirty kitchen towels, gym clothes and removed makeup off towels. The hose easily fits onto my shower (after unscrewing the shower head) and each wash load is a max of 15 mins (and you can repeat this as many times as you like). But the real surprise is how effective the spinner is at "drying" the clothes. I would say the 5 min spin cycle removes at least 90%-95% of the water from your clothes and even towels will be completely dry after a couple hours. One of my favorite purchases ever!
customer_reviews.author: 'Liv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Does a GREAT job at getting clothes clean - just like a full-sized washing machine. First day I did 4 loads and I'm very impressed with the way everything came out. The spin cycle is so thorough and clothes are barely damp when I hung them up...some light-weight blouses / T-shirts were dry within an hour. The gravity drain works very well and I'm just really happy to have this machine. There probably isn't anything that can be done but when the spin cycle starts it shakes the machine loudly for less than 10 seconds so I hold on to the machine as the spinning begins just to keep the noise down.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Lass

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but the Washer keeps stop spinning
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit smaller than I thought, but it is ok. Great washing machine, but twice now the both washers stopped spinning after I used it for sometime. I did complain to the seller the first time it stopped working and the washing machine was replaced, but the same happened again, that is, the washer stopped working. The spinner on both washing machines still works, it’s just the washer that does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love, and Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my unit. I fill it up with water via bucket to save time. It is set up in my tub with the goes laying flat next to my drain. I also have a lint trap set in my drain so that the lint doesn't go down and clog it. Being that I can wash and spin at the same time, it's lovely! I've used hot water, detergent, bleach, pods and it all works. I just make sure not to overload either side. I definitely recommend this portable washer if you do not have a washer dryer hookup or if you have a college student that wants to save money.
customer_reviews.author: Keeta Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is amazing! I put it in a spare bedroom next to bathroom so I dont have to lug laundry up and down a three story house. I use a big utility bucket to fill and drain. Clothes come out almost dry from the spinner. I just ordered a drying rack to use with it. Wish I had one when my kids where little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Krause

customer_reviews.title: This is a WONDERFUL product
customer_reviews.text: The drain hose is to short, would have been great if it were same length of water intake hose. Great portable washer. Does a fantastic job of cleaning and spinnig. This little unit is mighty! I LOVE IT. Beats washing by hand. My first load was a pair of jeans, 9 t-shirts & 6 wash cloths. Did a fantastic job! Had to spin out in 3 loads....only used 1 min to spin, WOW! I set my unit up on 2 heavy duty crates in bath tub (due to short drain hose) I secured drain hose to bottom of crate. Put power cord over shower door. PERFECT. I am thrilled with my purcase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I had this on a 2 foot high storage shelf at first, and it worked great. I now have it on a 3.5 foot shelf and it works even better. Because it drains out completely. I would buy this again for myself or as a gift. Looks exactly like the picture. And the turbo spinner really had the clothes approximately 94% dry. Just an estimate. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love my washer/spinner!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little machine and wish I had bought one sooner! It works great for my delicates but also handles towels too. Just don’t forget to turn the machine off of drain when you are filling it back up for another load. The hose to drain is very short but I was able to set up the machine on a table next to my tub and attach the hose to my shower chair with a twisty wire so it would drain without me having to hold it in place. So much better than going to a washateria!! The spin cycle is awesome because everything comes out very damp dry and even towels dry in a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirl 8

customer_reviews.title: Small place but Big Luxury!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little machine. Eliminates having to go to the laundry facility. Smalls loads only so I do a load every couple of nights. Still have to take blankets and larger items but saving time and money on everything else makes this an EXCELLENT purchase. Living in a 5th wheel travel trailer allowed me to downsize but having this makes it feel like luxury.
customer_reviews.author: JANNETTE WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camper living!
customer_reviews.text: I had read many reviews before ordering a washer/dryer combo for our camper. The one thing that is the hardest is washing clothes when staying in a camper full time. This is easy for us to store in the back bunkhouse and doesn't take up much room at all. When we go to use it we actually sit it in the shower and drain the hose right down the drain. The washer gets his work jeans completely clean and the spin dryer will get them almost dry and we hang them up to dry. If you are looking for something for camper life or even small apartment living this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: C Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Very good washer & spinner
customer_reviews.text: It’s very EASY TO move around.. The Washer isn’t to loud But the Spinner when it starts Its loud & SHAKES a lot then as it spins less noisy but still loud & then when it ends it SHAKES & LOUD I use in bathtub... I place a plastic box under it & the drain is GOOD But I still have to tip it over once done w both spinner & washer to get most of water out from drain... Overall it cleans clothes & thin sheets well But THICK towels don’t wash cause hard to drain & spinner goes crazy & doesn’t work that well when tying to spin
customer_reviews.author: Smithland

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high-end stackable washer/dryer combo. After 10 years the washer is no longer working. I couldn't afford to replace the unit, and was AMAZED and so HAPPY to find this precious gem that ACTUALLY WORKS! No plumber, no installation needed. I watched the "Amazon Customer" review including the video. I followed her instructions exactly and could not be more pleased and pleasantly surprised this thing WORKS! Yay. I've done many loads so far....fingers crossed this will keep working for a long time. The spinner does an EXCELLENT job. Right now this is my BEST purchase from Amazon- and that is saying A LOT! Will update as the days and loads progress...
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel J

customer_reviews.title: Works but requires effort
customer_reviews.text: The machine works great in every way if it wasn’t for the stupid drain pipe. It is so small!! It is a pain to use this unless I carry it into the bathtub as the pipe is minuscule plus it’s gravity based so I can’t even use a attachment pipe and make it go into the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Sha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Washer/Spinner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this as I can now stay away from the laundromat with the current virus situation. It saves me considerable stress. It does a little at a time, but that's fine for me as I only wash for myself. I am heavy but I can wash a few pair of jeans at a time. The spinner holds about half of the washer, but I don't mind this either. The machine seems very sturdy and powerful, no lag or flimsiness. It is quiet, I cannot hear it from the next room if my air conditioner is on. I am very impressed with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: The best small washer I ever used.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to control the spin cycle is 20 times faster dinner regular washer dinner regular washer when I take out my clothes they are almost completely dry it fits into any small space easy to pick up and move uses less water uses less soap powder I only use a third of a cupI only use a third of a cup or a 1/4 fourth cup or a 1/4 fourth cup to do my wash it's the best wash machine I have ever order . I recommend this wash machine I recommend this wash machine to anybody to anybody is in College or a small apartment or a small apartment sincerely William Tyler .
customer_reviews.author: W. M. TYLER

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best purchase I made on Amazon in 2019. I use it all the time in my apartment. It does a fantastic job. I place it in my bathtub and fill it with my shower's handheld sprayer. You can was everything except blankets/rugs/long bath robe. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Sneaker411

customer_reviews.title: Decent washer, better buy a good lint removal brush too.
customer_reviews.text: It actually does a decent job removing dirt from clothes. It does not do a good job washing black clothing. This has absolutely no way to prevent lint from building up on your clothes. The spin dryer works better than I thought it would, clothes are usually 100% dry after a few hours of hanging in front of a fan. It can be noisy if you are having trouble with it balancing the load. I recommend filling the dryer portion to its max for easier and quieter drying.
customer_reviews.author: JakeD

customer_reviews.title: The hose does not fit with any faucet we have.
customer_reviews.text: Its really troublesome. For one its too small. Also the pipe they provided does not attack to any faucet. Its really upsetting to spend so much money on something that's more of a gimmick. Sure you can wash a handful of clothes at a time, then dry less than that at at time. But it'll take up your entire day. And good luck trying to fit it into your faucet, you'll end up pouring water into a vessel then emptying that vessel into the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam M.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest washer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine about 2 months and use it almost every day for my family's laundry. It gets everything I've put into it cleaner than I expected it would. I frequently wash towels, sheets etc too. The spinner removes enough water to get everything dry in about an hour on the line outside. I wish I had bought this thing sooner. I bought a handheld dog shower for the tub to fill it with and it's so easy to operate I've even taught my nine and 12 year olds how to wash their own laundry in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Compact but not super strong
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to have the new compact laundry machine come in but it wasn't as powerful as I thought it would be. It could be because I was washing heavier clothes but I don't like that it's noisy and it doesn't do cleaning well on the thicker clothes. I really like that it's very easy to move around and it's very compact. Overall, it does its job well with summer clothes but during the winter I think going to the laundry mats might be better or having the bigger laundry machines will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Min Zhen Chen

customer_reviews.title: A great starter washer
customer_reviews.text: We got this a few months ago, and while I had some doubts, my gf loved it. It saves us money on using the facility downstairs, though I feel like it raised the electric bill some. Not a bad tradeoff, though, as we no longer get mystery socks or panties in our wash. It is a bit bulky and awkward if you don't have a decent setup, but the spin cycle is actually pretty good at wringing out moisture from clothes. We might upgrade to something later, but for now it's going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Small, lightweight and portable. Cleans small to medium loads of clothing including bed sheets and towels. No lint trap is included I had to attach netting you can purchase on Amazon to attach to the hose. The hoses do not fit the faucets but n my apartment. So again I had to purchase a hose to attach to my faucet in order to fill the washer. Once these issues were addressed it’s been pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: starburst2080

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Would not repurchase. Im actually going to return the item. I bought it so that i could do small daily loads at my house instead of visiting the wash house. However after trying it out once, im not impressed. The side that washes the clothes is much BIGGER than the side that spins the clothes. So if you wash too much at once, you have to divide the load to spin it out properly thus making the wash process take longer than a normal machine cycle. The drain is short so id recommend using it in a shower or having something to catch the water once it drains.
customer_reviews.author: Sharay Graham

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars I would. First off this thing ruins clothes. It stretches them out, pulls tons lint off them and doesn’t wash well. Secondly when I put in the request to return the product they accepted it on the condition of me paying for the shipping. The shipping is twice the cost of the machine! This thing is garbage save your money and your clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: A great little washer for the price. Its compact, easy to use and is easy to hook up. Cleans well. Great Spin cycle. Cons: The drain hose is awful and will not likely fit your sink so be prepared to buy an alternative. I winded up buying an air conditioner drain hose and an aerator to fit my kitchen sink. Drain cycle is great but I still have to tip it over to make sure all the water is out. Overall I would recommend it for small loads. Beats going to the laundry mat in my book.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this great machine.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived early today. Ive done three loads of my laundry so far. Mostly underware and t-shirts. But I love it so far. Already saved me several hand washings and a trip to the laundry mat. Just follow the operating instructions. Though as others have mentioned, I to set it in chair to drain. I had my son set it up in my shower. Use my hand held shower head to fill it. I love the work, time and expense of the laundry mat it is saving me! But I highly recommend attaching a knee high pair of hose over the drain hose to catch any lent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All is well
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is a life and money saver, no more laundromat for me. Just got it today and i havent stopped washing. So far no problems. Follow the directions and you should be fine. Only one tip when washing towels etc dont use to much soap half of cap should be fine. UPDATE: IT DIED TODAY, it wasnt over loaded or anything it just stopped. Have a video... Hope we can fix the issue, waiting for a response. Update The company sent a brand new one in 2 days, i hope all goes well this time, because i still say this is a great investment... thanks for the speedy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awful customer support
customer_reviews.text: First time I plugged it in and turned it on it tripped GFCI outlet. I reset outlet and tried again and it tripped. I tried a different outlet with the same results. Quality control is obviously substandard. There is a ground fault inside unit and it was sold to customer. I reached out to seller several times with no response and in order to return you have to pay for the shipping which costs as much as the unit. So you are rolling the dice on this one. I have patiently waited for a response for several months and have heard nothing.
customer_reviews.author: EandM

customer_reviews.title: Big help
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little washer. We don't have washer or dryer hook ups so this helped allot. Gets the job done you just can't wash large items like blankets. The unit is also very hard to drain as if you don't elivate it a large amount of water stays in the bottom. The first washer we received had a broken base in the spin dryer but the seller sent us a new one after.contacting them. The new unit works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Okay so far but...
customer_reviews.text: It works really well so far but ours was obviously used. The drain to connect to the pipe was dirty looking as if it was a bit old. We cleaned everything before using it. Also should be noted that the drain to release the water is on the bottom of the machine so you would need to have the machine elevated above wherever you plan to drain your water.
customer_reviews.author: skyllar

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved!
customer_reviews.text: What everyone says about this little beauty is true! Perfect for an RV, apartment, or small loads! I love mine. I have no hookup for laundry - But now I only go to laundromat when I have a stack of towels or rugs! Do make sure to rinse it out and wipe the insides out after every load. The spin cycle is brilliant! My clothes are dry on the line in an hour!
customer_reviews.author: D. Frances Young

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Light, Easy to move, Easy to use. It's so powerful. I definitely did not expect it to be so efficient. Also, the spinner, so great, practically fully dries. Although, I've only spun 2 or three items at a time. I am so impressed by this machine. Sooo cute. Tip: Don't add too much detergent. (Um...yea. Suds for days. It's like putting dishwashing liquid in a dishwasher. No! Haha!) Also, you can just fill with the amount of water you need instead of attaching the hose to a faucet. Much easier IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Nature

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive it due to pandemic and fear of going to the laundromat. I put a few small items in...it washed good, next few days wanted to wash a second time it kept noise but wasn't spinning, I returned it over a month ago... no money back as yet
customer_reviews.author: aries

customer_reviews.title: Clothes come out almost dry
customer_reviews.text: Great for our studio. It's such a great help so we don't need to go to the laundromat during this pandemic. When the spin finishes, the clothes is almost dry. Took about 1 hr or less to fully dry after hanging it outside in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Urijah

customer_reviews.title: Small, functions ok, clothes ‘pill’, returns are expensive
customer_reviews.text: Functional small washer/spinner. Gravity drain only, so must be positioned on level ground or elevate the unit so water flows down the drain tube. Don’t like that clothes have ‘pills’ and/or ‘linty’ things stuck afterwards. Tried to return (due to being too small & ‘pill’ reasons) but seller wasn’t agreeable to my reasons and return shipping cost was more than purchase price!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Save your time and money on this machine. First of all, the “gravity drain,” should really be labeled “manual,” as it’s function has nothing to do with gravity. The drain tube is way too short and doesn’t come with sink adapter that will fit any standard sink to run water to wash with this machine. If I were you, I would take the extra cash to invest in a more effective washer with automatic draining capabilities. Not worth it at all! And the merchant had the nerve to charge me for shipping after taking 2 weeks to refund me for this piece of crap! Stay away from this merchant!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: This has transformed my life! I HATE doing laundry but this has made it possible for me to get a quick load done each week while saving water and a LOT of time! So many ways to make it adjust to your space including directly filling that washer part with water from a shower head. I highly reccomend for anyone looking to have an in unit washer/ dryer. Barely need to hang up most items for more than half a day 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact washer
customer_reviews.text: So after using this machine for a few months, I feel that I can give it an honest review. This thing is simply amazing for small loads! The spinner function is quick with the clothes being 90-95 dry. The hose connecting to the faucet is a waste and I cant be bothered with it..just use some buckets to fill this thing up and youre ready to go..in no way does this take the place of a large washing machine for bedding and large towels, but it's good to have for quick little loads
customer_reviews.author: sharon sabov

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of my life
customer_reviews.text: I live in the smallest apartment and this appliance is a lifesaver. I've been using it for about a month now and its exceeded all expectations. The price can't be beat and this little machine is a power house. Its quiet, effective, light weight, and after watching some videos so easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Rue J

customer_reviews.title: For my apartment with no hookups
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this washer. I definitely suggest an extension chord, or big bucket. I pick mine up and drain it in the bathtub for now until I get one or the other. It’s super satisfying to drain the dirty water in my opinion. For sure have to hang dry everything if you don’t have a portable dryer as well. I have not had to go to the laundromat a single time since moving into my apartment that doesn’t even have hookups. If you’re thinking about getting this do it
customer_reviews.author: Soggywaffles

customer_reviews.title: First time using spin cycle, shelled out on me and won’t work again
customer_reviews.text: I had JUST gotten this, super excited.. it’s located on solid, flat tile in my bathroom. wash cycle worked great. Went to use the spin cycle, loaded only 1/3 of my clothes to make sure I didn’t over pack it... spin cycle started working then suddenly The machine started rocking back and fourth really fast and then I heard a click and it just stopped. Haven’t been able to get it to work since. I’ve taken the back off to try and see if a switch was flipped or anything and see nothing.. very disappointed.. maybe i just got a defected one but I can’t find a number or contact information for customer service either... very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Ugolini Family

customer_reviews.title: Peace out Laundromat!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a dream! Wash in one side spin in the other...Ta Da!!! Its perfect size to hang out in your shower, light enough to move as you need it. I don't use the faucet/hose filler attachment, I just use the shower head to fill up the tub. The spin function is better than traditional washers because the clothing come out halfway dry! Wash a load in the evening, hang on the drying rack and in the morning fold it and put it away! That easy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Plain

customer_reviews.title: Love this and I dont know how I ever lived without one
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a washer or dryer to having this is great. I can fit about 1/2 a normal load and put a few items in the spinner at a time. Sweaters fit and a fitted sheet and top sheet will fit one at a time with just that item in the spinner. The washer will fit the full load of sheets, but no blankets. Towels can be washed and spun- typically spun 1 at a time unless small. Just tips! I would still say this is an essential item!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If I can put no stars I would. I bought this in advance for my newborn baby’s clothes & when baby finally came I had to wash I plugged it in and it didn’t turn on. Turns out motor was burned for NO REASON. Waste of $170....
customer_reviews.author: Israel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Compact easy to use.. no more wobble..
customer_reviews.text: Fits in the closet, at first made a loud shsky noise I was going to return it then I contacted the manufacturer, they said it's doing that because it's unbalanced, when I use the dryer part I sometimes put clothes on top of the load I'm drying on top of the plastic thing. Then it stops wobbling.. not a bad machine.. good for quick small loads to.. dries nice.. fits in the closet nicely..
customer_reviews.author: Aquines

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Ok so...after almost 3 years of no washer and dryer in our cute little cabin, and many many trips to the local laundry area, we finally got a portable washer. I've never in my live been SO happy to do laundry, even though tonight my wonderful husband has ben been doing it. Small but mighty and quiet. I love this thing, long story short...be thankful for the little things, now more than ever 😉
customer_reviews.author: Maddelyn Acosta

customer_reviews.title: It's great for last minute!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and how lightweight it is totally easy to move around. Not to happy with the cord length when I put it on the ground it wouldnt reach the wall plug above the sink. Also the hose to fill tub is not universal I actually had to hold in place and it still took forever to fill. I finally just used my detachable shower head to fill it. The spin part amazing almost dried the clothes. It did take at least 3 spin loads to get all the washer items done. My clothes smelled so clean and I barely used any soap. Definitely love this machine I just had a couple issues.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie cabral

customer_reviews.title: Worthless...
customer_reviews.text: The spinner gets off-balance very easily. It can only spin one item at a time or it starts knocking and is ineffective. By one item in the spinner, I mean 'one item'. One pair of skivvies, one sock, one shirt. But if you don't use the spinner, everything is just too wet. I just went to use it and the wash cycle won't work. At all. Don't waste your money! Handwashing is more effective and easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Washes great and the spin is POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is POWERFUL! way more than what I expected. The spin can get loud only if the clothes are unevenly distributed, but it's quiet for sure. I live upstairs so I can't use it at night anyways to be nice, but so far, I love it! You cannot put big covers in there though, but that's ok, and the loads are a bit on the small side, but so far so good! Will update in a couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: Nakita

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 5 months now, still runs just like the first time, great! My washer came with some cosmetic issues on the lid which I was initially upset about but quality comes with a price, so it’s not that big of a deal. Length of the out take hose might be an issue for some people, but I have mine on a table right next to my bathtub. The spin dry part of the washer gets clothes near perfectly dry, so I only have to air dry clothes for a day or two. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen
